scripts.dev: concurrently -n frontend,server -c auto "yarn workspace frontend dev" "yarn workspace server dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n frontend,server -c auto "yarn workspace frontend start" "yarn workspace server start"
scripts.build: concurrently -n frontend,server -c auto "yarn workspace frontend build" "yarn workspace server build"
scripts.build:win: BUILD_OUTPUT=$PWD/build/windows yarn workspace server build && BUILD_OUTPUT=$PWD/build/windows yarn workspace server pkg:win && BUILD_OUTPUT=$PWD/build/windows yarn workspace frontend build:win
scripts.build:mac: BUILD_OUTPUT=$PWD/build/mac yarn workspace server build && BUILD_OUTPUT=$PWD/build/mac yarn workspace server pkg:mac && BUILD_OUTPUT=$PWD/build/mac yarn workspace frontend build:mac
scripts.build:linux: BUILD_OUTPUT=$PWD/build/linux yarn workspace server build && BUILD_OUTPUT=$PWD/build/linux yarn workspace server pkg:linux && BUILD_OUTPUT=$PWD/build/linux yarn workspace frontend build:linux
scripts.typecheck: yarn workspace frontend typecheck && yarn workspace server lint
scripts.format: yarn workspace frontend format && yarn workspace server format
scripts.lint: yarn workspace frontend lint && yarn workspace server lint
